data.title: Flash Box
data.text: Is an Israel courier company that provides express and reliable package transport.We provide our courier services to regular and business customers.

data.title: Regular customer
data.text: To enjoy our services, you need to register on the site and fill in all your personal details and choose a username, the password will be your ID. Then We will send you an address (the address is uniform for all customers!). When you place an order online, you have to chooses the Flash Box service or type in the address you received. As soon as the package arrives to us we send it to your house!, this means that you don't have to collect the package by yourself or go to Collection points. Rather, we send it to your home door.

data.title: Business Customers
data.text: For businesses that have chosen our services, they must add the Flash Box to their shipping options. Each business will have its own cabin and the packages are arranged by regions.
